list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: each of the four divisions of the year (spring, summer, autumn, and winter) marked by particular weather patterns and daylight hours, resulting from the earth's changing position with regard to the sun.
a period when a female mammal is ready to mate.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the bitch can come into season at irregular intervals
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chó cái có thể vào mùa trong khoảng thời gian không đều

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: add salt, herbs, pepper, or other spices to (food).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: season the soup to taste with salt and pepper
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nêm súp để nếm muối và hạt tiêu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: make (wood) suitable for use as timber by adjusting its moisture content to that of the environment in which it will be used.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I collect and season most of my wood
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi thu thập và mùa hầu hết gỗ của mình
